Articles.Content:
For those few of us who like to mix our games and channel Eugen's magnificent Wargame series into KSP a bit

**Reccomended Mods:**

BD Armory: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-1-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-1-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-3)

PEW:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117635-WIP-1-0-2-R1-P-E-W-%28A-BDArmory-Addon%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117635-WIP-1-0-2-R1-P-E-W-%28A-BDArmory-Addon%29)

Never Enuff Dakka: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118824-WIP-Never-Enuff-Dakka-A-BDArmoury-expansion?p=1896201#post1896201](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118824-WIP-Never-Enuff-Dakka-A-BDArmoury-expansion?p=1896201#post1896201)

Zokesia Soviet Planes pack: [http://www./download/iikus7db9eibk7q/Soviet+Plane+Pack.rar](http://www./download/iikus7db9eibk7q/Soviet+Plane+Pack.rar)

Zokesia everything: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96093-Zokesia-Skunkworks%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96093-Zokesia-Skunkworks%21)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T10:00:14Z" title="07/06/2015 10:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Thatdude253**
  
Update
oh neat.
Sooooooo, we need replica cold war aircraft
what about the naval battle club? that thread has spess battles too.

(Image is link)

> 
> Sooooooo, we need replica cold war aircraft

![tKkIWAO.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/tKkIWAO.png?1)

![UNaEseM.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/UNaEseM.png?1)
Heh, I built a Harrier. Non-stock, but it flies ok. I'll post pictures in a bit
So Red Dragon is on sale at the moment. Anybody playing it or ALB at the moment?
what did happen to the naval battle club thread anyway?

![658F43D61A7467CC743787065D0936C556984A08](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/37497130787400816/658F43D61A7467CC743787065D0936C556984A08/)

When an [AH-64](http://www.worldwide-military.com/Military%20Heli%27s/Attack%20heli%20plaatjes/Groot/AH-64%20Mk1_003.jpg) and a [Ka-50](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/acecombat/images/d/db/ACAH_Ka-50_Color_03.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120207200439) have a lovechild. Also has a bit of [Comanche](http://www.aviationinsurors.com/images/arts/comanche.jpg).

Reason being that double rotors were too hard, and no Black Shark cockpit. 

Not the best, but it works perfectly.
Double rotors could be interesting. Maybe if you modded the attachment rules?

Cold War aircraft?

![oSThhBz.png](http://i.imgur.com/oSThhBz.png)

By the way this is Blackjack.
Damn good job for using stock pieces!

\*coughs\*

![i2H3ApF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/i2H3ApF.jpg)

**T-34 Family**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**The T-34 was one of the most widely produced armored vehicles in the modern world. Here are the three most produced versions, in KSP replica: T-34 1940, T-34 1942, and T-34-85.**

**All Three come with rotating turret (just decouple from the body and switch to it). Make sure to use forward-facing docking ports to "control from here", since the control pods are often the wrong way around. Automatically set to have the middle three wheels non-operationall to allow high-speed turning. Camoflage not included.**

***Download (RAR):*** [https://www./?vbz71kaw8h10m7u](https://www./?vbz71kaw8h10m7u)

***Download (Individual):***

***T-34 1940:*** [http://www./download/2g...-34+1940.craft](http://www./download/2g48anb9kxyfwv9/T-34+1940.craft)

***T-34 1942:*** [http://www./download/u0...-34+1942.craft](http://www./download/u0oipf48dbz02a5/T-34+1942.craft)

***T-34-85:*** [http://www./download/jo.../T-34-85.craft](http://www./download/joyo8tl768ornuk/T-34-85.craft)

![5xtJkBU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5xtJkBU.jpg)

**Soviet Planes Pack**

**Accurate replicas of every major Soivet Cold-War Era craft, including 13 fighters, 2 bombers, 1 attacker, 1 transport, and 3 trainers.**

**Flaps are on action Group "4" for most planes - check before you fly.**

[***DOWNLOAD***](https://www./?iikus7db9eibk7q)

**By Zekes, War Eagle 1, SpaceXray, and Mad Rocket Scientist.**
